snippet.title: Into Samomor (Game Trailer)
snippet.description:
#gamedev #indiegame #horrorgaming 

Into Samomor is an action horror adventure game in pixel art style that doesn't take itself too seriously, for twisted minds who like to decide people's fates and explore their deepest secrets. Be a force from the real world, and join Henry to find his friend and solve the mystery case of 19 missing people in Samomor town.

🔥 Wishlist the game on Steam: https://store.steampowered.com/app/2373890/Into_Samomor/

Twitter (X): https://twitter.com/intosamomor
Join our Discord: https://discord.gg/W4YJ7PrSe5
